# Welcome to the STEW FAQ! {.unnumbered}

Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions (FAQs) related to the [SWAMP Bioaccumulation Monitoring Program](https://www.waterboards.ca.gov/water_issues/programs/swamp/bioaccumulation_monitoring.html) (Program), the [Safe to Eat Workgroup](https://mywaterquality.ca.gov/monitoring_council/bioaccumulation_oversight_group/index.html) (STEW) and related bioaccumulation topics.

This [Quarto book](https://quarto.org/docs/books) is an open, living, and continuously iterating resource. If you have suggestions for additions or revisions you think should be incorporated into this resource, please follow the guidance provided in the [Contributing](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/stew-faq/contribute.html) section.
